description: This requirement is for DND/Digital Transformation Office (DTO) requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following stream(s): ... Please see reference link for full details
full_summary:
### Event Details
#### Tender Name and Reference

* English: **Organizational Development Consultant**
* French: **Expert-conseil du développement organisationnel**
* Reference Number: **W6952-24-007**
* Amendment Number: **1**

#### Notice Publication Dates

* Public Notice Date: **2023-04-06**
* Tender Closing Date: **2023-04-21 14:00:00**
* Amendment Date: **2023-04-21**

#### Tender Period

* Expected Contract Start Date: **2023-06-01**
* Expected Contract End Date: **2024-05-31**

#### Current Tender Status

* Tender Status: **Expired**
* Notice Type: **Request for Proposal (RFP)**

#### Procurement Details

* Category: **SRV** (Services)
* Method: **Competitive - Open Bidding**
* Evaluation Criteria: **Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price**

#### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity

* Canada

#### Regions of Delivery

* Canada

#### Required Security Level

* Company Security Level: **Reliability**
* Resource Security Level: **Reliability**

#### Contracting Entity and Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: **Department of National Defense (DND) / Digital Transformation Office (DTO)**
* Contact Name: **Nancy Pelchat**
* Contact Email: **nancy.pelchat@forces.gc.ca**
* Contact Phone: **(613) 281-0419**
* Contact Address: **285 Coventry, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1K 3X6**

#### Identified Suppliers

* Accenture Inc.
* BP & M Government IM & IT Consulting Inc.
* Bridgetown Consulting Inc.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* Maplesoft Consulting Inc.
* NATTIQ INC
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Pleiad Canada Inc.
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Protak Consulting Group Inc
* SEASI Consulting Inc.
* TDV Global inc.
* Transpolar Technology Corporation and The Halifax Computer Consulting Group In
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

### Description of the Requirement
The Digital Transformation Office (DTO) requires the services of an Organizational Development Consultant to lead the stand-up organization efforts.
